Description:
AFFORDABLE LIVING IN A PERFECT POSITION
Nestled in a peaceful tree lined street this triple fronted weatherboard home is sure to impress. Tastefully updated with fresh colour tones, plush carpets, new tiles, polished timber floors and a sparkling new kitchen with 600ml stainless steel cooktop and dishwasher.
-3 bedrooms, 2 with B.I.R's
-Tiled meals adjoining kitchen
-Open study, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling
-Single carport, garage/workshop
-Original 3 piece bathroom
The private, established low maintenance 595sqm allotment offers shade and space for children, Ideal for first home buyers and investors.... Currently returning $295pw available with vacant possession.

Description:
Period Charm in a Coveted Location
In one of White Hills best tree lined streets, close to Botanical gardens, kindergartens and terrific schools. This alluring home presents a myriad of options for the home buyer, renovator or investor on a generous allotment. Classically comfortable with period beauty, the four bedroom, 2 bathroom layout comprises welcoming wide entrance. Boasting an instantly appealing faÃ§ade this attractive Edwardian family home surrounded by picturesque gardens on a large block is captivating and showcases a seamless combination of refined period elegance and charm. Polished floorboards and 14 ft ceilings create a cohesive flow through to the casual lounge which opens to the rear verandah. The adjacent kitchen and meals zone tastefully incorporates Falcon Cooker, Bosch dishwasher, slate floor and plenty of natural light. Running off the central hallway are four bedrooms, two with fireplaces. Large Additional improvements are ducted heating, decorative cornices, original leadlight, ceiling roses, double hung cedar windows and stunning return verandah. Further enhancements are refurbished bungalow with split system, ideal for home office, studio or teenagers retreat. Side gated entry provides easy access to the large workshop with concrete floor, ideal for those running a small business from home.

Description:
Light and Bright - The Perfect Family Home
The perfect house, in the perfect street with the most perfect neighbours. Everything about this fantastic property points in the direction of a must-have, offering many extra features and benefits with upgraded fixtures and fittings throughout.
Built with a family in mind, the home incorporates a huge open plan living area, including kitchen/meals, family and sitting room.
The superb kitchen has been designed for those that truly love to cook, and features an impressive Caesar stone island bench, 900mm cooker, along with a stainless steel dishwasher and pantry.
3 of the 4 bedrooms contain built-in wardrobes, and the main has a walk-in wardrobe and ensuite with his and her Caesar stone vanities.
Gas heating as well as evaporative cooling, is conveniently ducted through the ceiling. The home also offers secure direct access inside from the double garage. Outside you will find an extensive undercover Merbau deck area for those who love to entertain with ample extra features.
All of this overlooks low maintenance, fully landscaped gardens and lawn area, perfect for children and pets to play.
There is a bonus of a garden shed with concrete floor and another great feature is the side access for boat or trailer. There's nothing left to do, but book an inspection, move in and make plans for a great house warming.
Matt Gretgrix : 0438 911 688

Description:
A Touch of Class
There are many reasons why this stunning home was recently featured on Channel 7's “Australia's Best Homes”. Beautifully appointed by a local, private builder, the home represents the very best in quality and style. From its polished timber flooring to its quality fixtures and fittings, everything has been thought of.
Four generous living areas include the formal lounge, cinema room, family area and an entertainment room with polished concrete floor, built-in-barbeque and bar. The open kitchen/meals/family area has a wonderful mix of textures, overlooks the in-ground pool and contains an ultra-modern kitchen with a butler's pantry and Bosch appliances. Size, quality and space continue throughout the entire home with the family bathroom featuring twin vanities, large shower and separate powder room.
Situated on over 4000 square metres of land, the positives aren't limited to the just home itself - tradesmen, handymen or car enthusiasts will enjoy the 8.5 x 18 metre shed with drive-through access and further parking for vehicle storage. Fully landscaped to make the most of the allotment, this property has a bush backdrop and is located within close proximity to the new Bendigo Hospital, Bendigo CBD and Lake Weeroona.
Two covered outdoor entertaining areas have polished concrete floors, while the heated in-ground pool with water feature and underwater lighting has its own dressing room with shower, toilet and vanity. Further features of this impressive craftsmen built residence include ducted heating and cooling, ducted vacuum, three-car garage with gymnasium, office and a three-kilowatt solar power system.
An entertainers paradise and a truly remarkable property that needs to be seen to be believed.
Bill Williams : 0477 277 562

Description:
Beautifully Presented Home In Quiet Court
Situated in a quiet court, walking distance to schools, public transport and the magnificent Lake Weeroona, is this immaculate 3 bedroom home. Features include a spacious lounge room with a gas heater and air conditioning, a practical kitchen with gas appliances, ample cupboard space & a ceiling fan. All 3 bedrooms have built-in robes and share the family bathroom. Step outside to the beautifully manicured gardens with ample access for 2 cars, a caravan or trailer. There's also a rain water tank and a storage shed. The home's presentation is impeccable and this is evident upon an inspection.
Luke Goggin Real Estate - We Get Results 5442 1422

Description:
READY AND WAITING
This impressive family home offers all that the family could need! Comprising 3 bedrooms plus a study, the master suite offers a walk in robe and ensuite, with built in robes to the remaining two bedrooms, spacious living, a very generously sized family kitchen meals area plus the added convenience of storage throughout. A real highlight to this lovely home is the external entertaining area which can be used for many different forms of pleasure. The double garage with electric roller doors offers through vehicle access to the rear shed, which is L-shaped and is approximately 32m2.The property also includes 2 rain water tanks which have a dripper system attached to water the established garden and fruit trees and 3.2kw solar connected for potential electricity savings. The home offers great access to schools, shops, public transport and the Botanical Gardens and would suit the family, retiree or investor alike. An inspection is sure to impress, contact the agent for further details.
Please note: ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A PHONE NUMBER

Description:
Stunning and Superior Design
Brand new and only recently completed are these stylish and tastefully designed townhouses. Built by a local builder, SAS Construction these townhouses offer quite a uniqueness.
From the modern facade to the contemporary fittings and fixtures throughout you won't be disappointed! These two bedroom townhouses offer open plan living along with a thoughtful floor plan.
Both bedrooms feature a built in robe and the central bathroom is conveniently located, the separate laundry and toilet facilities are of a generous size and allow flexibility and easy access.
The kitchen, meals and living area is a great space and includes split system heating and cooling for year round comfort. Other modern conveniences include a dishwasher, fully enclosed, low maintenance yard with complete landscaping and a single lock up garage with internal access.
Situated within very short walking distance to local shops, primary school and the Botanical Gardens, with only two on the block these townhouses could easily become the newest addition to your property portfolio or you could just move in and enjoy the low maintenance luxury yourself!
As Bendigo continues to grow with more and more infrastructure programs taking place it remains a fantastic place to live and invest. In the current rental market we estimate the properties to achieve a rental return of approximately $260 - $280 per week. Contact us today to discuss this exciting opportunity!

Description:
1st Home Buyers and Investors Take Note!
Located in popular White Hills, you will find this original, but well-maintained home, ideal for 1st home buyers or investors.
With 9ft ceilings throughout, the home features 3 bedrooms, 3 piece bathroom, bright lounge with original decorative fire place, and kitchen with electric cooking and plenty of cupboards. Climate is controlled with a gas wall heater and air-conditioning unit.
From the lounge room, there is access through large sliding doors to an undercover alfresco area, perfect for entertaining.
Single carport, garden shed and well-kept gardens with plenty of room for kids and pets to play, completes this affordable property.
Looking to add to your investment portfolio?
The expected rental return on this home is around $260pw - $270pw.
Close to shopping centre, schools, public transport and a nice easy walk to the Botanical Gardens.
This could be your great start into the property market. Call for an inspection.
Matt Landy : 0459 098 848

Description:
A GREAT PLACE TO START!
This much loved family home is a low maintenance clad weatherboard on a lovely parcel of land measuring 790 sqm (approx). This affordable entry level property offers immense potential. Featuring a large formal lounge with gas heater and A/c, separate modestly updated kitchen / meals area, with a wide hallway access to three large bedrooms. With old-time character throughout with high ceilings, timber floor & door frames. Bring your imagination & your thinking cap to visualise cosmetic changes to create possibilities. Lovely garden & setting, located less than three km to the CBD, walking distance to Lake Weeroona, bike riding & walking tracks & the Hospital.

Description:
Classic Charm, Conveniently Located
A classic home with appeal for all, this exceptional weatherboard sits in a convenient location; the three-bedroom property would suit first time buyers, downsizers, or investors. The entry introduces a functional design with a good-sized separate lounge, which leads to a stylish and up to date kitchen & dining area overlooking the low maintenance front garden. It is here that all your entertaining needs will be met. Designed for maximum comfort and privacy, all three bedrooms are separated by a hallway from the living areas and boast the service of a modern contemporary bathroom. Ducted heating & cooling for all year round comfort, beautiful polished timber boards, large block, good shedding, light bright and inviting, and a secured family friendly backyard. Not one to be missed this affordable property will be tempting for many buyers to call it their own new home.

Description:
Exceptional townhouse with street frontage!
This spacious, two bedroom townhouse is situated in a terrific location, close to Lake Weeroona, Bendigo CBD and the new Bendigo Hospital. Quality constructed by a private builder, the home features sizeable bedrooms, well-proportioned living spaces and a sparkling kitchen with stainless steel appliances and plenty of storage.
Located opposite the White Hills shops, the modern townhouse offers direct entry into the tiled hall via the garage with automatic roller door, flowing into the formal lounge and continuing to the second living/dining area and kitchen space. Two sizeable bedrooms, laundry, separate toilet and main bathroom come off the carpeted hallway and the paved courtyard offers entertaining space for the new owner.
Street frontage, modern fittings and still under builders warranty, making this a stress-free investment, first home or down-sizer - inspect today.

Description:
OUTSTANDING VALUE
Situated within short walking distance to the beautiful Botanical Gardens and an easy drive in to the Bendigo CBD is this very affordable three bedroom residence.
Features include an updated kitchen with dishwasher, ducted cooling, gas log fire, spacious lounge, and an outdoor Alfresco area.
Allotment size of 687m2 with undercover parking for 2 cars.
The property has been returning $275 per week and vacant is possession is available.

Description:
Build Your Dream Home - White Hills
A rare opportunity awaits you with this huge 2286m2 (1/2 acre) allotment in the central location of White Hills.
This block offers privacy from the street with 2 boundaries to be fully fenced with colorbond but still having that rural living feel.
A BAL rating of 12.5 and all services available, your future home for you and your family to grow could be a lot closer than you think!
With the Botanic Gardens, schools, sporting facilities and local shops all in walking distance, make this land a must see and contact us today to arrange your inspection!
Damien O'Shannessy : 0417 055 593

Description:
A Great Place To Start Or Invest
Set in a lovely quiet court just off Napier Street sits this affordable property which offers great potential. Featuring a large lounge with gas heater and A/c, separate kitchen/Dining area, 3 bedrooms and the added bonus of an extra room which could be used as a 4th bedroom. Leave as is and secure a tenant at an expected $260 per week, or bring your thinking cap and imagine the possibilities..
